title: All in One Nero [Todo los Nero en Uno]
description:
All in One Nero [Todo los Nero en Uno]

===========
::English::
===========
Multimedia Suite Nero - multimedia package list of 3 to 1 for the recording of video editing and backup. Nero powerful single package that consists of three products - Nero Vision Xtra Nero BackItUp Nero Burning ROM & Burn - gives the user a maximum of multimedia capabilities. It has advanced video editing software media player to record a great CD technology reliable backup and special multimedia tools to enhance the music and video files and photos. Edit video with Nero Vision Xtra:
Search Play and easily organize all your photos music and videos using multimedia organizer in one place.

Use advanced editing tools for video (picture in picture effects of total control master track special effects and transitions differ) in the multitrack Timeline to make truly personal work
Create high definition movies on DVD and Blu-ray SmartEncoding to accelerate high definition video and burn Blu-ray disc format, high quality cinema with 24 successive frames

The media player supports all popular video and audio photo formats such as AVCHD FLAC MKV FLV DVD MPEG-4 AVC (S) VCD and Audio CD AVCREC and multiple playlists and slide shows
Photo log and video music CD to DVD and Blu-ray, as well as access to social networking projects

Burning with Nero Burning ROM:
Warranty readable discs regardless of age wear and scratches thanks to the security SecurDisc technology
Transferring files using drag and drop to burn to CD, DVD and Blu-ray, as well as to store images
Separation of large files to burn to multiple drives
Additional data protection through encryption and add personal passwords
High quality reproduction of the contents
Perfect copies of records with uninterrupted reliable burns
Backup & Burn with Nero BackItUp:
Perform automatic backups on a single touch without changing the settings on your computer
SecurDisc technology - to ensure the readability of the data to increase the chances of file recovery data protection against accidental changes and source data verification
Backup Hard Drive CD-DVD-Blu-ray-drives and memory cards online FTP storage
Restore personal data after a computer failure or malfunction
Restore damaged or deleted files from hard drives CD-DVD-ROM drive and flash disk
Backup files and folders across multiple devices simultaneously
